abstract: Microsoft will take a stake in Shanghai-listed Changhong Electric and work with the firm to jointly develop entertainment products that can be accessed via the Internet, Changhong said. Changhong Electric said in a statement on Monday that Microsoft would take a 94-million-yuan ($12.3 million) stake in the firm by purchasing 15 million new shares.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft will take a stake in Shanghai-listed Changhong Electric and work with the firm to jointly develop entertainment products that can be accessed via the Internet, Changhong said. Changhong Electric said in a statement on Monday that Microsoft would take a 94-million-yuan ($12.3 million) stake in the firm by purchasing 15 million new shares.

headline.main: Microsoft Takes Stake in Chinese Game Maker

abstract: After making an overture to Microsoft about a joint bid for Dow Jones, the General Electric Company, the parent of NBC, is now exploring that idea with Pearson, the publisher of The Financial Times, according to reports on Monday. The talks are still preliminary, and Rupert Murdoch’s $5 billion offer for Dow Jones represents a “a very high threshold,” The New York Times said. The Wall Street Journal quoted several sources describing the possibility of a deal as a “long shot.”
lead_paragraph: After making an overture to Microsoft about a joint bid for Dow Jones, the General Electric Company, the parent of NBC, is now exploring that idea with Pearson, the publisher of The Financial Times, according to reports on Monday. The talks are still preliminary, and Rupert Murdoch’s $5 billion offer for Dow Jones represents a “a very high threshold,” The New York Times said. The Wall Street Journal quoted several sources describing the possibility of a deal as a “long shot.”

headline.main: G.E. and Pearson Explore Bid for Dow Jones
